description:
calibre is the one stop solution to all your e-book needs.

calibre is an e-book manager. It can view, convert, edit and catalog e-books in all of the major e-book formats. It can also talk to e-book reader devices. It can go out to the internet and fetch metadata for your books. It can download newspapers and convert them into e-books for convenient reading. It is cross platform, running on Linux, Windows and macOS.
New features
- Book list: Allow controlling the tooltips displayed for every column using a template. Right click the column header and choose "Define tooltip template" to set the tooltip for that column
- MTP driver: Allow creating format specific destinations for audiobook files
  Closes tickets: 2121304
- Preferences->Keyboard: Allow searching by shortcut as well as by name
Bug fixes
- Kindle MTP driver: Fix APNX files being placed in incorrect location when books are sent to subfolders inside the root folder
  Closes tickets: 2121737
- E-book viewer: Read Aloud: Fix regression in previous release that broke changing voices when engine is set to 'Automatically select'
  Closes tickets: 2121897
- Fix a regression in the previous release that broke markdown output
  Closes tickets: 2121701
Improved news sources
- Harvard Business Review
- Outlook Magazine
